alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 11:18AM CST until February 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...Tennessee... Shoal Creek Near Iron City affecting Lauderdale and Lawrence Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Shoal Creek Near Iron City. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of low lying areas along Shoal Creek begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 14.2 feet and rising. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CST Thursday was 14.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.2 feet on 01/08/1998. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1200 AM CST.
